cofh.api.energy

Interface IEnergyProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEnergyConnection, IEnergyHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEnergyTransport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TileEnergyHandler

    public interface IEnergyProvider
extends IEnergyHandler
    Implement this interface on Tile Entities which should provide energy, generally storing it in one or more internal IEnergyStorage objects. A reference implementation is provided TileEnergyHandler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int extractEnergy(net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from, int maxExtract, boolean simulate)
      Remove energy from an IEnergyProvider, internal distribution is left entirely to the IEnergyProvider.

      • Methods inherited from interface cofh.api.energy.IEnergyHandler

        getEnergyStored, getMaxEnergyStored

      • Methods inherited from interface cofh.api.energy.IEnergyConnection

        canConnectEnergy

    • Method Detail

      • extractEnergy

        int extractEnergy(net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from,
                  int maxExtract,
                  boolean simulate)
        Remove energy from an IEnergyProvider, internal distribution is left entirely to the IEnergyProvider.
        Parameters:
        from - Orientation the energy is extracted from.
        maxExtract - Maximum amount of energy to extract.
        simulate - If TRUE, the extraction will only be simulated.
        Returns:
        Amount of energy that was (or would have been, if simulated) extracted.
